title: Shift + Enter (All Chat) Freeze Glitch
body:
Every now and then I get a glitch where when I try to all chat using shift + enter my champion just stops the ability to move, move camera etc. I can still use abilities but my champion is stuck where it is. 

Anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body:
Hey Fog,
This is the first I'm hearing of this.
- Did it only start after updating to 5.6?
- How often does it happen?

I first encountered the glitch in 5.4. I thought it went away in 5.5 but I experienced this yesterday. I didn't really know what the cause was until I read somewhere the others had experienced a similar problem when the shift + entered and I noticed that that was also the cause for me. I don't know about 5.6 since I haven't played with the new update yet. Can't really put a finger on how often it happens. It's very random.
I'm also a MAC user if that helps.

lol "lag" baits OP
What would happen if you used maokais w?
Movement abilities work. But you'll be stuck wherever the ability puts you afterwards.

New ultra-slow game of League. 
You can only move with mobility spells.
And riven has destroyed the enemy nexus before anyone else could leave the fountain.

This is definitely a very real bug - it may be Mac-specific but it's been tormenting me since 5.5. It'll lock me up for the remainder of the game and almost always result in a loss. Not only does this game-breaker rear its ugly head often, I've also noticed that those modifyer keys (shift, alt, control) aren't behaving as they used to. They no longer work at all on my mouse buttons when I hold them down - it's like the game doesn't realized that I've pressed them. Yet when I use the keyboard it's fine. Something has changed regarding those shift/alt/control keys, I'm sure of it. I'm glad I happened across this post and found out that it's not only me having issues.
